item.title: Florida high school football: When does practice, season start?
item.description: Florida high school footballseason is right around the corner with summer break soon to give way to fall camp, practices and more preseason gridiron action.

item.title: Why Big Ten desperately wants to rig College Football Playoff
item.description: At leastBig Tencommissioner Tony Petitti dropped any pretense that his vision for the future format of theCollege Football Playoffwould be a boon for anyone other than his conference.

item.title: Vote: Who is Sarasota-Manatee's all-time best state championship softball team
item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the fast-pitch softball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Save $200 on iRobot's Roomba 104 vacuum + mop combo for Prime Day
item.description: If you're as curious as I've been about self-cleaning vacuum's, this sweetiRobot vacuumis sure to pique your interest, especially with a 44% Prime member-exclusive discount duringPrime Day this week.

item.title: Save big on this retro Nintendo NES Classic Edition console at Walmart
item.description: Does anyone find themselves scouring the internet for throwback items like graphic t-shirts, sports memorabilia or games? They can sure get expensive in a hurry! Fortunately for those retro folks like myself, theNintendo NES Classic Edition Entertainment Systemeffortlessly embodies the nostalgia of its 1985 predecessor

item.title: Petition groups get partial victory in Florida lawsuitâ€¦
item.description: A federal judge upheld most of a new Florida law toughening regulations for petition gathering, butordered that state officialscouldn't enforce a provision forsome petition groupsthat prohibited nonresident and noncitizen volunteers from gathering signatures.
